info.name: IMPS API Collection (Dynamic)

variable.description: Message ID (Head @msgId): exactly 35 characters = Bank Participation Code (3, assigned by NPCI) + Unique ID (32, UUID/random/system-generated). Mandatory; required for ACK.

exec: // txnId / msgId: exactly 35 chars = BPC (3) + Unique ID (32). BPC assigned by NPCI; Unique ID = UUID/random/system-generated.
var bpc = 'BAN';  // Bank Participation Code, 3 chars (replace with NPCI-assigned BPC if different)
for (var i = 0; i < 32; i++) s += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length));

item.name: IMPS - NPCI to IMPS (Port 8081)
item.description: NPCI sends requests to IMPS. Dynamic path: /imps/{reqpay|reqchktxn|reqvaladd|reqhbt|reqlistaccpvd}/{txn_id}. Use unique txnId per request (duplicate returns 409). Rule 021: Head @msgId must be 35 chars (3 BPC + 32). Rule 022: Txn @id must be 35 chars. Head @msgId is required for ACK.

item.name: ReqPay - P2A Fund Transfer (Remitter to NPCI)

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ns2:ReqPay xmlns:ns2="http://npci.org/upi/schema/" xmlns:ns3="http://npci.org/cm/schema/">
    <Head ver="2.0"
          ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
          orgId="{{orgId}}"
          msgId="BAN5t2Dk18UFMIMFENLBga1234567890123"
          prodType="IMPS"/>

    <Txn note="P2A Fund Transfer"
         custRef="023113001276"
         refId="001276"
         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"
         ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
         refCategory="00"
         type="PAY"
         purpose="00"
         initiationMode="00"
         id="BAN5t2Dk18UFMIMFENLBgb1234567890123"/>

    <Payer addr="{{orgId}}@psp"
           name="Rugved Kharde"
           seqNum="1"
           type="ENTITY"
           code="4814">

        <Info>
            <Identity id="1234567890123456|HDFC0000001"
                      type="BANK"
                      verifiedName="Rugved Kharde"/>
            <Rating verifiedAddress="TRUE"/>
        </Info>

        <Device>
            <Tag name="MOBILE" value="919494916511"/>
            <Tag name="LOCATION" value=""/>
            <Tag name="TYPE" value="MOB"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccpTrId" value="NPC16511"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccIdCode" value=""/>
        </Device>

        <Ac addrType="ACCOUNT">
            <Detail name="ACNUM" value="1234567890123456"/>
            <Detail name="IFSC" value="HDFC0000001"/>
            <Detail name="ACTYPE" value="SAVINGS"/>
        </Ac>

        <Creds>
            <Cred subType="NA" type="PreApproved">
                <Data>MDB8QVBQUk9WRUQ</Data>
            </Cred>
        </Creds>

        <Amount value="1000.00" curr="INR"/>
    </Payer>

    <Payees>
        <Payee seqNum="0" type="PERSON" code="0000">
            <Amount value="1000.00" curr="INR"/>
            <Ac addrType="ACCOUNT">
                <Detail name="IFSC" value="ICIC0000001"/>
                <Detail name="ACTYPE" value="SAVINGS"/>
                <Detail name="ACNUM" value="1111222233334444"/>
            </Ac>
        </Payee>
    </Payees>
</ns2:ReqPay>

request.description: ReqPay P2A – NPCI format 6.1. Payer: Rugved Kharde 1234567890123456 @ HDFC0000001. Payee: Sajid Mulla 1111222233334444 @ ICIC0000001. Amount 1000.00. Mock Switch debit/credit (00).

item.name: ReqPay - P2P Fund Transfer (Chetan to Madhav)

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ns2:ReqPay xmlns:ns2="http://npci.org/upi/schema/" xmlns:ns3="http://npci.org/cm/schema/">
    <Head ver="2.0"
          ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
          orgId="{{orgId}}"
          msgId="BAN5t2Dk18UFMIMGzOucfb12345678901234"
          prodType="IMPS"/>

    <Txn note="P2P Fund Transfer"
         custRef="023113001284"
         refId="001284"
         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"
         ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
         refCategory="00"
         type="PAY"
         purpose="00"
         initiationMode="00"
         id="BAN5t2Dk18UFMIMGzOucfc12345678901234"/>

    <Payer addr="{{orgId}}@psp"
           name="Chetan Mokashi"
           seqNum="1"
           type="ENTITY"
           code="4814">

        <Info>
            <Identity id="9876543210987654|HDFC0000001"
                      type="BANK"
                      verifiedName="Chetan Mokashi"/>
            <Rating verifiedAddress="TRUE"/>
        </Info>

        <Device>
            <Tag name="MOBILE" value="919491916510"/>
            <Tag name="LOCATION" value=""/>
            <Tag name="TYPE" value="MOB"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccpTrId" value="NPC09101"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccIdCode" value=""/>

        <Ac addrType="ACCOUNT">

            <Detail name="IFSC" value="HDFC0000001"/>

            </Cred>
        </Creds>

        <Amount value="500.00" curr="INR"/>

    <Payees>

                <Detail name="ACNUM" value="5555666677778888"/>
            </Ac>
        </Payee>
    </Payees>
</ns2:ReqPay>

request.description: ReqPay P2P – NPCI 6.1. Payer: Chetan Mokashi 9876543210987654 @ HDFC0000001. Payee: Madhav Shipure 5555666677778888 @ SBIN0000001. Amount 500.00.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ns2:ReqPay xmlns:ns2="http://npci.org/upi/schema/" xmlns:ns3="http://npci.org/cm/schema/">
    <Head ver="2.0"
          ts="2026-01-25T13:18:37.263+05:30"
          orgId="{{orgId}}"
          msgId="BAN5t2Dk05P35IW2iSy2Pq12345678901234"
          prodType="IMPS"/>

    <Txn note="Foreign Inward Remittance"
         custRef="112013002995"
         refId="002995"
         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"
         ts="2026-01-25T13:18:37.000+05:30"
         refCategory="00"
         type="PAY"
         purpose="00"
         initiationMode="12"
         id="BANrZzpW5Cnb0000000000000000000000000"/>

    <Payer addr="{{orgId}}@psp"
           name="Rugved Kharde"
           seqNum="1"
           type="ENTITY"
           code="4814">

        <Info>
            <Identity id="1234567890123456|HDFC0000001"
                      type="BANK"
                      verifiedName="Rugved Kharde"/>
            <Rating verifiedAddress="TRUE"/>
        </Info>

        <Device>
            <Tag name="MOBILE" value="919494916511"/>
            <Tag name="LOCATION" value=""/>
            <Tag name="TYPE" value="MOB"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccpTrId" value="NPC16511"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccIdCode" value=""/>
        </Device>

        <Ac addrType="ACCOUNT">
            <Detail name="ACNUM" value="1234567890123456"/>
            <Detail name="IFSC" value="HDFC0000001"/>
            <Detail name="ACTYPE" value="SAVINGS"/>
        </Ac>

        <Creds>
            <Cred subType="NA" type="PreApproved">
                <Data>MDB8QVBQUk9WRUQ</Data>
            </Cred>
        </Creds>

        <Amount value="10000.00" curr="INR"/>

        <Institution route="RDA" type="BANK">
            <Name value="TRANSWISE"
                  acNum="123456789456"
                  ifsc="PCIN0234123"/>
            <Purpose code="Credit to Beneficiary in INR"
                     note="Foreign Inward Remittance"/>
            <Originator name="John William"
                        refNo="1234567891"
                        type="INDIVIDUAL">
                <Address location="Marlin Apartment Limehouse London"/>
            </Originator>
            <Beneficiary name="Sajid Mulla"/>
        </Institution>
    </Payer>

    <Payees>
        <Payee seqNum="0" type="PERSON" code="0000">
            <Amount value="10000.00" curr="INR"/>
            <Ac addrType="ACCOUNT">
                <Detail name="IFSC" value="ICIC0000001"/>
                <Detail name="ACTYPE" value="SAVINGS"/>
                <Detail name="ACNUM" value="1111222233334444"/>
            </Ac>
        </Payee>
    </Payees>
</ns2:ReqPay>

request.description: ReqChkTxn forwarded from NPCI to Beneficiary Bank

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<upi:ReqHbt xmlns:upi="http://npci.org/upi/schema/">
    <Head ver="1.0"
          ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
          orgId="{{orgId}}"
          msgId="HBT123456789012345678901234567890123"/>
    <Txn id="HBT123456789012345678901234567890123"
         note="Heartbeat Check"
         refId="123456"
         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"
         ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
         type="Hbt"/>
    <HbtMsg type="ALIVE" value="NA"/>
</upi:ReqHbt>

request.description:
ReqHbt - Heartbeat Request (ALIVE)

type = ALIVE: System health check
value = NA for ALIVE type

NOTE: Heartbeat must be sent every 3 minutes. If no response, NPCI may mark bank BIN down.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<upi:ReqHbt xmlns:upi="http://npci.org/upi/schema/">
    <Head ver="1.0"
          ts="2026-01-25T23:59:00.000+05:30"
          orgId="NPCI"
          msgId="EOD123456789012345678901234567890123"/>
    <Txn id="EOD123456789012345678901234567890123"
         note="End of Day Signal"
         refId="123456"
         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"
         ts="2026-01-25T23:59:00.000+05:30"
         type="Hbt"/>
    <HbtMsg type="EOD" value="2026-01-25"/>
</upi:ReqHbt>

request.description:
ReqHbt - End of Day (EOD) Signal

type = EOD: End of Day notification
value = DATE (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ns2:ReqListAccPvd xmlns:ns2="http://npci.org/upi/schema/">
    <Head ver="2.0"
          ts="2026-01-25T23:40:15.000+05:30"
          orgId="{{orgId}}"
          msgId="PNB4a69d250abe6433899c2f5a08fc0qw12X"/>
    <Txn id="PNB4a69d250abe6433899c2f5e7dad71c12X"
         note="List Account Provider Fetch"
         refId="123456"
         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"
         ts="2026-01-25T23:40:10.000+05:30"
         type="ListAccPvd"/>
</ns2:ReqListAccPvd>

request.description:
ReqListAccPvd - Request to fetch list of banks, NBIN, IFSCs and their status.

Only active IFSCs are returned.
Banks must perform full refresh on every invocation.

body.raw:

         refId="860454"
         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"

         type="NameEnq"/>

    <Payer addr="{{orgId}}@psp"

        <Info>

                      type="BANK"
                      verifiedName="ENQUIRER NAME"/>
            <Rating verifiedAddress="TRUE"/>

        <Device>
            <Tag name="cardAccpTrId" value="DNB67667"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccIdCode" value="DNB917667667667"/>
            <Tag name="MOBILE" value="917667667667"/>
            <Tag name="LOCATION" value="HDFC BANK MOB7667667667IN"/>

            <Detail name="ACNUM" value="1111222233334444"/>
            <Detail name="ACTYPE" value="DEFAULT"/>
        </Ac>

</ns2:ReqValAdd>

request.description:
ReqValAdd - Name Enquiry Request

type = NameEnq: Used to fetch beneficiary name before fund transfer

Used for account validation before initiating IMPS transfer.

item.name: NPCI Mock - IMPS to NPCI (Port 8083)
item.description: Simulates IMPS sending responses to NPCI Mock. Dynamic path: /npci/{resppay|respchktxn|respvaladd|resphbt|resplistaccpvd}/{txn_id}. Use same txnId as the request flow.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ns2:RespPay xmlns:upi="http://npci.org/upi/schema/">
    <Head ver="2.0" ts="2026-01-25T10:31:00.000+05:30" orgId="700003" msgId="BAN41VdwjcZ9jaI4pifN12345678901234" prodType="IMPS"/>
    <Txn id="BAN5t2Dk18UFMIMFENLBgb1234567890123" note="Fund Transfer" refId="001276" custRef="023113001276" refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/" ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30" purpose="00" type="CREDIT" subType="PAY" initiationMode="00" refCategory="00"/>
    <Resp reqMsgId="BAN5t2Dk05P35yQrXk0eCv12345678901234" result="SUCCESS">
        <Ref type="PAYEE" seqNum="0" addr="1111222233334444@ICIC0000001.ifsc.npci" regName="Sajid Mulla" acNum="1111222233334444" IFSC="ICIC0000001" code="0000" accType="SAVINGS" settAmount="1000.00" orgAmount="1000.00" settCurrency="INR" approvalNum="111374" respCode="00"/>

item.name: Switch - IMPS to Switch (Port 8082)
item.description:
IMPS sends requests to Mock Switch (port 8082). Dynamic path: /switch/{reqpay|reqchktxn|reqvaladd|reqhbt|reqlistaccpvd}/{txn_id}. Response requests (RespPay, RespChkTxn, etc.) simulate Switch sending back to IMPS at {{impsBaseUrl}}/switch/{resppay|respchktxn|...}/{txn_id}.

Use account_master seed accounts for ReqPay: Payer 1234567890123456@HDFC0000001 or 9876543210987654@HDFC0000001, Payee 1111222233334444@ICIC0000001 or 5555666677778888@SBIN0000001.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ns2:ReqPay xmlns:ns2="http://npci.org/upi/schema/" xmlns:ns3="http://npci.org/cm/schema/">
    <Head ver="2.0"
          ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
          orgId="{{orgId}}"
          msgId="BAN5t2Dk18UFMIMFENLBga1234567890123"
          prodType="IMPS"/>

    <Txn note="P2A Fund Transfer"
         custRef="023113001276"
         refId="001276"
         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"
         ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
         refCategory="00"
         type="PAY"
         purpose="00"
         initiationMode="00"
         id="BAN5t2Dk18UFMIMFENLBgb1234567890123"/>

    <Payer addr="{{orgId}}@psp"
           name="Rugved Kharde"
           seqNum="1"
           type="ENTITY"
           code="4814">

        <Info>
            <Identity id="1234567890123456|HDFC0000001"
                      type="BANK"
                      verifiedName="Rugved Kharde"/>
            <Rating verifiedAddress="TRUE"/>
        </Info>

        <Device>
            <Tag name="MOBILE" value="919494916511"/>
            <Tag name="LOCATION" value=""/>
            <Tag name="TYPE" value="MOB"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccpTrId" value="NPC16511"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccIdCode" value=""/>
        </Device>

        <Ac addrType="ACCOUNT">
            <Detail name="ACNUM" value="1234567890123456"/>
            <Detail name="IFSC" value="HDFC0000001"/>
            <Detail name="ACTYPE" value="SAVINGS"/>
        </Ac>

        <Creds>
            <Cred subType="NA" type="PreApproved">
                <Data>MDB8QVBQUk9WRUQ</Data>
            </Cred>
        </Creds>

        <Amount value="1000.00" curr="INR"/>
    </Payer>

    <Payees>
        <Payee seqNum="0" type="PERSON" code="0000">
            <Amount value="1000.00" curr="INR"/>
            <Ac addrType="ACCOUNT">
                <Detail name="IFSC" value="ICIC0000001"/>
                <Detail name="ACTYPE" value="SAVINGS"/>
                <Detail name="ACNUM" value="1111222233334444"/>
            </Ac>
        </Payee>
    </Payees>
</ns2:ReqPay>

request.description:
RespPay to Switch - Send XML or ISO.

Content-Type: application/xml (XML body below) OR application/octet-stream (ISO binary). Mock Switch converts XML to ISO, logs, and forwards ISO to IMPS Backend using dynamic path: http://localhost:8081/switch/resppay/{txnId}.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ns2:RespPay xmlns:upi="http://npci.org/upi/schema/">
    <Head ver="2.0"
          ts="2026-01-25T10:31:00.000+05:30"
          orgId="{{orgId}}"

         note="Fund Transfer"
         refId="001276"

         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"
         ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
         purpose="00"
         type="CREDIT"
         subType="PAY"
         initiationMode="00"
         refCategory="00"/>

    <Resp reqMsgId="BAN5t2Dk05P35yQrXk0eCv12345678901234"
          result="FAILURE"
          errCode="91">
        <Ref type="PAYEE"
             seqNum="0"
             addr="1111222233334444@ICIC0000001.ifsc.npci"
             regName=""
             acNum="1111222233334444"
             IFSC="ICIC0000001"

             accType="SAVINGS"
             settAmount="0.00"
             orgAmount="0.00"
             settCurrency="INR"
             approvalNum=""
             respCode="91"/>
    </Resp>
</ns2:RespPay>

request.description:
RespPay Failure to Switch - Send XML or ISO.

Mock Switch converts XML to ISO and forwards to IMPS Backend. Common Response Codes: 91 (Issuer unavailable), 12 (Invalid transaction), 51 (Insufficient funds).

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<upi:ReqHbt xmlns:upi="http://npci.org/upi/schema/">

          ts="2026-01-25T10:30:00.000+05:30"
          orgId="{{orgId}}"
          msgId="HBT123456789012345678901234567890123"/>

         note="Heartbeat Check"
         refId="123456"

</upi:ReqHbt>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ns2:ReqValAdd xmlns:ns2="http://npci.org/upi/schema/" xmlns:ns3="http://npci.org/cm/schema/">
    <Head msgId="BAN5t2Dk18UFMIRH8K84fV1234567890123"
          orgId="{{orgId}}"
          prodType="IMPS"
          ts="2026-01-25T14:48:23.373+05:30"
          ver="2.0"/>

    <Txn custRef="023314480540"
         id="BAN5t2Dk18UFMIRH8K84fW1234567890123"
         initiationMode="00"
         note="Name Enquiry Request"
         refId="860454"
         refUrl="https://www.npci.org.in/"
         ts="2026-01-25T14:48:01.000+05:30"
         type="NameEnq"/>

    <Payer addr="{{orgId}}@psp"
           code="4814"
           name="ENQUIRER NAME"
           seqNum="1"
           type="ENTITY">

        <Info>
            <Identity id="12110100020142|HDFC0000001"
                      type="BANK"
                      verifiedName="ENQUIRER NAME"/>
            <Rating verifiedAddress="TRUE"/>
        </Info>

        <Device>
            <Tag name="cardAccpTrId" value="DNB67667"/>
            <Tag name="cardAccIdCode" value="DNB917667667667"/>
            <Tag name="MOBILE" value="917667667667"/>
            <Tag name="LOCATION" value="HDFC BANK MOB7667667667IN"/>
            <Tag name="TYPE" value="MOB"/>
        </Device>

        <Ac addrType="MOBILE">
            <Detail name="MMID" value="4002111"/>
            <Detail name="MOBNUM" value="919494916511"/>
            <Detail name="ACTYPE" value="SAVINGS"/>
        </Ac>
    </Payer>

    <Payee code="0000" seqNum="0" type="PERSON">
        <Ac addrType="ACCOUNT">
            <Detail name="IFSC" value="ICIC0000001"/>
            <Detail name="ACNUM" value="1111222233334444"/>
            <Detail name="ACTYPE" value="DEFAULT"/>
        </Ac>
    </Payee>
</ns2:ReqValAdd>

item.name: Reference - Response Codes
item.description: Common IMPS/NPCI Response Codes for reference

request.description:
**RESPONSE CODES REFERENCE (This is not an actual API)**

**Success Codes:**
- 00 - Transaction Successful

**Failure Codes:**
- U12 - Invalid/Incorrect payee account number
- U14 - Invalid/Incorrect payee MMID
- U30 - Beneficiary bank not available
- U31 - Invalid beneficiary IFSC
- U48 - Transaction not permitted to card holder
- U51 - Insufficient funds
- U66 - Device fingerprint mismatch
- U68 - Credentials not present
- U78 - Transaction Declined
- 91 - Issuer unavailable
- 12 - Invalid transaction
- 51 - Insufficient funds
- 96 - System malfunction

**Account Types (ACTYPE):**
- SAVINGS
- CURRENT
- DEFAULT
- NRE
- NRO
- CREDIT
- PPIWALLET
- BANKWALLET
- SOD
- UOD
- SEMICLOSEDPPIWALLET
- SEMICLOSEDBANKWALLET
- SNRR

**Transaction Types:**
- PAY - Debit from Payer
- CREDIT - Credit to Payee
- VR - Verification Request (ChkTxn)
- NameEnq - Name Enquiry
- ValAdd - Address Validation
- Hbt - Heartbeat
- ListAccPvd - List Account Providers

**Initiation Modes:**
- 00 - Default (Mobile)
- 12 - FIR (Foreign Inward Remittance)

**Device Types:**
- MOB - Mobile
- WAP - WAP
- IVR - IVR
- ATM - ATM
- BRC - Branch
- MAT - Mobile Assisted Transaction
- SMS - SMS

**Institution Routes (for FIR):**
- MTSS - Money Transfer Service Scheme
- RDA - Rupee Drawing Arrangement

**RefCategory Values:**
- 00 - NULL
- 01 - Advertisement
- 02 - Invoice
- 03-09 - Reserved
